item.title: People
item.description: People that contributed to the project currently include: Dominique Makowski Daniel Lüdecke Mattan S. Ben-Shachar Indrajeet Patil Philip Waggoner Michael D. Wilson Jonas K. Lindeløv Jacob Long

item.title: easystats
item.description: easystats is a suite of R packages designed to make the use of advanced statistical techniques easy.
